long_description: This Brooks Flyer bicycle saddle offers plenty of charm and comfort, thanks to real leather construction and springs for extra cushioning. Leather provides natural "give" by stretching and flexing, and because it doesn't need padding, it's a cool option in warm weather. The saddle will age and break in over time. Rear bag loops permit the use of a traditional English-style touring bag on the rear of the seat.
short_description: This Brooks Flyer bicycle saddle offers plenty of charm and comfort, thanks to real leather construction and springs for extra cushioning.
